sentences.english: The doctor who had been used to see separation and death burst into tears at that moment.
sentences.chinese: 看惯了生离死别的医生，却在这一刻落泪了。

sentences.english: Neither shall there be sorrow or dying.
sentences.chinese: 也不再有悲伤和生离死别。
